body: @LordCellofEarth9 You know if we list NTR logic and we will find out most of them is "are you kidding me"

The funny thing about the drug part in these's stories is they shouldn't work in the way the writers make them work! Not to mention if anything went wrong and the husband never work up or he had to be taken to the hospital. These's facts would likely come up! In which case wife's only recourse is to snitch on asshole  and claim she was threaten to avoid going to jail (seeing how weak willed she was to the NTR, she's weak willed enough to save HERSELF less she get listed as his helper!) as yeah, I can see jail time for the drugging alone! A good tip kiddies is don't try this at home! Things happen in a Hentai because the Writer allows it to! Try it in reality and it's likely to REALLY not end well for ya! LOL
So that mean we should used anti dose before drug someone right?
